Introduction to the Ionic Security .NET SDK

The Ionic Security .NET SDK enables the integration of Ionic's data protection platform into any application.

Version

The Client SDK version is 2.0.0

Modules

  • Agent Overview : Handles network communication with api.ionic.com, including key creation and retrieval
  • Crypto Overview : Cryptographic primitives such as AES, RSA, RNG, etc.
  • ChunkCrypto Overview : Small to medium size data encryption into optimally small ASCII cipher text
  • FileCrypto Overview : File encryption of any file type and size
  • Log Overview : General purpose logging framework
  • .NET SDK Exceptions Overview : Error handling for the .NET SDK wrapper
  • KeyVault Overview : KeyVault wrapper for the .Net SDK that supports local, temporary, secure storage of data protection keys.

Thread Safety

All objects and functions in the SDK are not thread-safe. The only exceptions are the log module (Log Overview) and KeyVault (KeyVault Overview).

For example, an Agent object should never be used by more than one thread at any given time. It is recommended to create one Agent object per thread when possible. Another possibility is to create a resource pool of Agent objects that can be used ad-hoc by worker threads.

If an object is used simultaneously by multiple threads, then the behavior of the program becomes undefined and there will most likely be memory corruption and crashing.
